HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Fa'amatalaga e fa'amaonia, fa'amautu ma puipuia e Stellar Security
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: Matou te mautinoa i le puipuiga malosi o au fa'amaumauga tāua. O fa'amaumauga uma e fa'amaonia i le tagata fa'aoga. E le iloa e matou lau IP, le mea e fa'asoa ai, po'o ai e fa'asoa ai fa'amatalaga secrecy - ma o le mea e taua, o le fua.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: O le fa'amaoniga i le fa'amaonia e tagata e te iloa e fa'apea e fa'afoe ai le fa'amaumauga fa'ata'ita'iga ma o ai e fa'asoa ai. A'o le faia o se fa'amaoniga, e mafai ona e fa'aofi se fa'avae e mafai ona fa'amaonia ai. E mafai fo'i ona fa'atū se taimi fa'atau. E le mafai ona tuai fa'amaoniga i le 14 aso.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_TITLE: Fa'amaonia i le fa'aoga i le pito i le pito
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: O fa'amaumauga uma ma le fa'amaumauga e fa'a'ese'ese i le tagata fa'aoga, o lona uiga e le iloa e matou le fa'amaumauga ma le fa'amaumauga. E mafai e le fa'amaoniga taʻitasi ona avea ma ID fa'ata'ita'iga o le umi o le 36 o se fa'amaoniga i le auala e mafai ai ona e fa'afoe le Fa'amaoniga Fa'amatalaga ma le fa'amaumauga e fa'amaonia i le AES-256.

HOWITWORK.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Fa'amatalaga e fa'amaonia, fa'amautu ma puipuia e Stellar Security
HOWITWORK.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY_DESCRIPTION: Stellar Secret e fa'atagaina oe e fa'asoa fa'atasi so'otaga va'aia ma mea ma'ale'ale i totonu o se feso'ota'iga faalilolilo, e na'o oe e te iloa, ma e iloa e le tagata e taliaina. O le auala sili, e taofia ai faʻamatalaga maaleale mai soʻo se avefeʻau-apps.
